## core package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ComponentBuilder](./core.componentbuilder.md) | ComponentBuilder is used to build a component from a ComponentInterface and return a BuildResultInterface with the result. |
|  [Deferred](./core.deferred.md) | TypeScript implementation of a deferred promise that can be resolved or rejected at a later time. |
|  [FileCollector](./core.filecollector.md) |  |
|  [PageBuilder](./core.pagebuilder.md) | PageBuilder is used to build a page from a PageInterface and return a BuildResultInterface with the result. |
|  [PageManager](./core.pagemanager.md) | PageManager is a helper class to manage the page interface. It provides methods to get and set nodes in the page interface. It also provides methods to move nodes in the page interface. |
|  [PropertyInterface](./core.propertyinterface.md) |  |
|  [StyleCollector](./core.stylecollector.md) | StyleCollector is used to collect all styles from a page and return a BuildResultInterface with the result. |
